name: Ultimate Steak Sandwich
author: fotoe!78
summary: Make the ultimate steak sandwich with tender and juicy steak and sauteed onions served on a toasted hard roll with garlic-Parmesan mayonnaise, provolone cheese and Italian seasoning. Don't forget to roll up your sleeves!
directions: Preheat an oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C)
Split the rolls open and toast them on a baking sheet in the oven while it is preheating
Mix together the mayonnaise, garlic, and Parmesan cheese in a small bowl
Remove the rolls from the oven when toasted as desired
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Carefully place the sliced steak and onions in the pan and season with sea salt, Worcestershire sauce, and liquid smoke
Cook and stir until the steak is browned and the onion is tender, about 10 minutes
Generously spread the prepared garlic-Parmesan mayonnaise on both halves of the toasted rolls
Divide the steak and onion mixture evenly among the bottom halves of the rolls, piling them high
Top each with 2 slices provolone cheese and sprinkle with Italian seasoning
Place the tops on the sandwiches
Bake the sandwiches on a baking sheet in the preheated oven until the cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
